game.name: Cities: Skylines II
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 역대 가장 현실적인 도시 건설 게임의 허허벌판에 도시를 세워 메트로폴리스로 키워보세요. 창의력과 문제 해결 능력을 한층 더 자극하게 됩니다. 정교한 시뮬레이션과 살아 숨 쉬는 경제를 활용해 제한 없이 나만의 세계를 그려보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Raise a city from the ground up and transform it into a thriving metropolis with the most realistic city builder ever. Push your creativity and problem-solving to build on a scale you've never experienced. With deep simulation and a living economy, this is world-building without limits.

reviewHighlights.text: No. Just No. As a CS1 enjoyer I was excited when this game got announced and then ordered the ultimate edition. LITERAL YEARS later only minor updates...
Game has become unplayable for me. Even a moderate sized world is so slow and the simulation speed lags and freezes.
